ingredients.ingredient: ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste (Optional)
¼ teaspoon five-spice powder, or to taste (Optional)
¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste (Optional)
2 teaspoons liquid smoke flavoring, or to taste (Optional)
½ cup barbecue sauce, or to taste

cookingTips: Sous vide cooking creates incredibly tender, juicy ribs impossible to achieve with traditional methods
Season and vacuum-seal ribs with dry rub; cook at 165°F for 24 hours
Quick sear on grill or under broiler after sous vide for caramelized exterior and barbecue sauce adhesion
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This uses advanced sous vide technique. Do you have the equipment, and are you comfortable with precision temperature cooking?
